briefTitle: Erector Spinae Plane Block Versus General Anesthesia in Breast Cancer Surgeries
officialTitle: Comparison of the Efficacy of Bilevel Erector Spinae Plane Block and Single Level Erector Spinae Plane Block Versus General Anesthesia in Breast Cancer Surgeries
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female
* Diagnosed with breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patient refusal
* coagulation defects
* bone metastases
* abnormal kidney and/or liver function tests
